com.mapdigit.gis

Class MapRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapObject
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapRoute

  • public final class MapRoute
extends MapObject
    Objects of this class store information about a single route in a directions result. it should not directly create objects of this class.
    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
